bdglue2.common

Class PropertyManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdglue2.common.PropertyManagement

  • public class PropertyManagement
extends Object
    Manage properties for the application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PropertyManagement(String defaultProperties, String externalProperties)
      Load the properties from the properties file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean asBoolean(String property, String defaultValue)

      Return the requested property as an integer, setting a default value if it hasn't been initialized.

      Get a list of all of the property names.

      Return the singleton instance.
      static PropertyManagement getProperties(String defaultProperties, String externalProperties)

      Get the value of the specified property.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PropertyManagement

        public PropertyManagement(String defaultProperties,
                          String externalProperties)
        Load the properties from the properties file.
        Parameters:
        defaultProperties - name of the default properties file
        externalProperties - name of the external properties file

    • Method Detail

      • setProperty

        public void setProperty(String property,
                        String value)
        Set a property for this environment. If the property doesn't exist, a new one is created.
        Parameters:
        property - the name of the property
        value - the value associated with this property

      • getProperty

        public String getProperty(String property)
        Get the value of the specified property.
        Parameters:
        property - the name of the property whose value is to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        the value of the requested property

      • getProperty

        public String getProperty(String property,
                          String defaultValue)
        Get the value of the specified property, setting a default value if the property has not been intitialized.
        Parameters:
        property - the name of the property
        defaultValue - the default value to set if it has not been initialized.
        Returns:
        the value of the requested property.

      • asInt

        public int asInt(String property,
                 String defaultValue)
        Return the requested property as an integer, setting a default value if it hasn't been initialized. No error checking is performed here. If the value of the property is not in fact representative of an integer, results will be indeterminent.
        Parameters:
        property - the name of the property
        defaultValue - the default value
        Returns:
        the value of the property as an integer.

      • asBoolean

        public boolean asBoolean(String property,
                         String defaultValue)
        Return the requested property as a boolean value, setting a default value if it hasn't been initialized. No error checking is performed here. If the value of the property is not in fact representative of a a boolean, results will be indeterminent.
        Parameters:
        property - the name of the property
        defaultValue - the default value
        Returns:
        the value of the property as a boolean value.

      • getKeyNames

        public Set<String> getKeyNames()
        Get a list of all of the property names.
        Returns:
        a Set of those names.

      • loadProperties

        public void loadProperties(String defaultProperties,
                           String externalProperties)
        Load the properties from their storage locations.
        Parameters:
        defaultProperties - name of the default properties resource
        externalProperties - name of the system property that has the file name of the external properties file.

      • getPropertySubset

        public Properties getPropertySubset(String prefix,
                                    boolean trimPrefix)
        Return a subset of the properties that begin with "prefix".
        Parameters:
        prefix - the prefix of the properties to return.
        trimPrefix - true: return the subset with "prefix" removed.
        Returns:
        the subset of the properties.

      • printProperties

        public void printProperties()
        Print the properties for this instance of PropertyManagement.

      • printProperties

        public void printProperties(Properties props)
        Print the properties found in the specified instance of Properties in sorted order.
        Parameters:
        props - the properties to print

      • getProperties

        public static PropertyManagement getProperties(String defaultProperties,
                                               String externalProperties)
        Typically, we want a singleton in our application that will hold all of our properties. This supports that use case.
        Parameters:
        defaultProperties - the name of the default properties file
        externalProperties - the name of the external properties file
        Returns:
        the singleton instance of PropertyManagement

      • getProperties

        public static PropertyManagement getProperties()
        Return the singleton instance. This method assumes that the overloaded method of the same name has already been called to construct the properties instance.
        Returns:
        the singleton properties instance
